scripts.help: echo 'Display help information (this screen)' &&   npm run
scripts.develop: echo 'Run MAGE in development mode' &&             npm run mage
scripts.start: echo 'Start MAGE as a daemon' &&                   mage start
scripts.stop: echo 'Stop the MAGE daemon' &&                     mage stop
scripts.restart: echo 'Restart the MAGE daemon' &&                  mage restart
scripts.reload: echo 'Reload the MAGE daemon' &&                   mage reload
scripts.status: echo 'Check the MAGE daemon status' &&             mage status
scripts.config:server: echo 'Show the compiled MAGE configuration' &&                           mage config:server
scripts.config:client: echo 'Show the compiled MAGE configuration used by clients' &&           mage config:client --app game
scripts.archivist:create: echo 'Create archivist vaults (based on current configuration)' &&     mage archivist:create
scripts.archivist:migrate: echo 'Migrate archivist vaults (based on current configuration)' &&    mage archivist:migrate
scripts.archivist:drop: echo 'Drop the archivist vaults (based on current configuration)' &&   mage archivist:drop
